thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and best service
thread.title_full: Great location and best service - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: markeR6888BN
title: Great location and best service
text: This hotel is in the best location in London and the service is excellent from the doorman up. Rooms are spacious and very well equipped. Only negative was I wouldn't use the hotel transportation as they provide you with smoke filled vehicles.
